XIII.i.1.C.1.a
.
RPO Jurisdiction in Claims for Extension of the Educational Assistance Delimiting Date
The jurisdiction of all rating determinations required in claims for extension of the educational assistance delimiting date resides with the regional processing offices (RPOs) in
Buffalo
, and
Muskogee.
If an RO receives a request for a delimiting date extension, the RO should route the request to the RPO of jurisdiction.
Note
:  The address of the claimant’s educational facility determines which RPO has jurisdiction over the claim.
Reference
:  For more information on the alignment of ROs and RPOs, see
M22-4, Part III, 1.02
.
